title: Influence of photosynthetic active radiation on sap flow dynamics across forest succession stages in Dinghushan subtropical forest ecosystem
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Jianqiang Huang, Fasih Ullah Haider, Wanxuan Huang, Shizhong Liu, Brian Njoroge Mwangi, Vincent Suba, Lindsay Sikuku, Xuli Tang, Qianmei Zhang, Guowei Chu, Deqiang Zhang, Juxiu Liu, Ze Meng, Dennis Otieno, Yuelin Li
